title: Trespasses Against Us
description: Celia Costain finds it tough being thought of as the perfect principal's daughter at John Paul 2 High. Being Catholic has never been easy, but now Celia s friends are all dating and say she s uptight. Celia can deal with that, but how can she relax with someone stalking her friend Allie? And no one will tell her what s really going on! John Paul 2 High, Book Two
author: Christian M. Frank
